title: Blended Learning-Based Gamification Course for Enhancing Argumentative Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic writing structures and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Social Sector Job Competency Enhancement Program for Job Seekers, Emphasizing Argumentation Structure Design Skills via Real-Time Discussions and Online Collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can complete an argumentative essay of over 500 characters following a structured argumentation framework (introduction-body-conclusion) by Week 4.
Learners can write at least three topic-related posts per week on an online discussion platform and incorporate peer feedback.
Learners can achieve over 80% participation in peer assessment activities based on points earned through a gamification system.

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (e.g., Edmodo or Padlet)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
